name: adesso/adesso_cms_starter
description: Sets up a adesso CMS site with useful features and sample content.

suggest.drupal/drupal_cms_events: A content type and view to help you manage events.
suggest.drupal/drupal_cms_news: Adds a news content type with an overview page and related news items.
suggest.drupal/drupal_cms_person: Adds a person profile content type that provides information about a person.
suggest.drupal/drupal_cms_project: Adds a project content type that provides information about an example of work to the intended audience.
